        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		COMMENT Material for blocks metalic in nature, such as bells, iron (trap)doors, and cauldrons, as well as brewing stands and compressed ore blocks such as diamond, redstone, and lapis blocks.
          
          
            
            		COMMENT Material for blocks metallic in nature, such as bells, iron (trap)doors, and cauldrons, as well as brewing stands and compressed ore blocks such as diamond, redstone, and lapis blocks.

            		COMMENT Material for blocks metallic in nature, such as bells, iron (trap)doors, and cauldrons, as well as brewing stands and compressed ore blocks such as diamond, redstone, and lapis blocks.
          
          
            
            		COMMENT Material for blocks metallic in nature, such as cauldrons, bells, iron doors, and iron trapdoors. It also includes non-obvious blocks such as brewing stands and compressed ore blocks, including diamond, redstone, and lapis blocks.
